title: Senior Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate should have 5+ years of experience in software development and strong knowledge of modern web technologies.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Join our team as a Frontend Developer. Experience with React, Vue, or Angular required. Strong CSS and JavaScript skills are a must.

title: Backend Developer
description: Looking for an experienced Backend Developer with strong knowledge of Node.js, Python, or Java. Database design and API development experience required.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Seeking a DevOps Engineer to manage our infrastructure. Experience with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes required.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Join our creative team as a UI/UX Designer. Strong portfolio and experience with Figma or Adobe XD required.

title: Mobile Developer
description: Looking for a Mobile Developer with React Native experience. iOS and Android development skills required.
